caption: Interesting and delicious dishes, good service, and great prices. This place is good for all ages. The portion sizes are pretty healthy so you feel like you're getting your money's worth. Both the chicken and waffles and fish and chips are excellent. It's a great brunch/ lunch/ early dinner restaurant.
Outstanding food and service! The best delicious food in Brooklyn. Makes you feel at home. Highly recommended.
Best lunch restaurant in Bat Ridge. Been going to the Common for some time never disappointed. Food and Service is excellent. Friendly staff. Nice atmosphere with an open kitchen. Many return trips.

This restaurant has amazing food. The selection of brunch, breakfast, and lunch foods is outstanding, and everything I've ever gotten there has been great. If you are searching for gluten free food in Brooklyn, this is a good choice.
The interior is so clean and freshly decorated. Eclectic menu offering healthy choices of fine tasting food. This is a favorite lunch restaurant of mine.
There were absolutely no issues with this small little café in Bay Ridge. And I've been eating here for 3 years. The place is clean and tidy, and the food is absolutely delicious.

My friends and I had a great time here a few nights ago. The drinks were very cheap for Brooklyn. The waiters were attentive and very responsive. I also heard the food is delicious here, so I’ll probably try it soon.

I've been eating here for a couple months now. Both breakfast and lunch. I work in the area, and even if I didn't work here, I would still go to this place. They have the best and most delicious breakfast pita pocket in Bay Ridge.

This is a very clean little place in Bay Ridge that we visit frequently. The Crispy Potato Tart is excellent and the launch was always warm and fresh. I am really impressed, to be honest. So yes, I recommend this cafe.
Wow, excellent serving! Delicious food! My kids loved Best Delicious Food Brooklyn, even though it's a bit small. The good thing is that you won't ever have any problems with overcrowding and noise.

I would visit again when I'll get back to Brooklyn. Why? Because even though it's a small place, you feel like home. They are very attentive and the dishes are absolutely delicious. I recommend this little cafe from the bottom of my heart!
It's a pleasure to award this small restaurant a 5 star rating here. I've been there twice already. They move very fast and are very attentive. The food is the best in Brooklyn in my opinion.

Every time I have lunch or breakfast here, they have something nice for me (like the corn chowder with prosciutto chips, for instance). The menu is very well thought of. And you won't even imagine how low the prices can be... You wouldn't believe you're still in Brooklyn...

I really didn't expect the salmon scramble to be so tasty. Absolutely delicious! And the kinds loved it too. They are usually pretty picky, so I am really surprised. The prices were more than fair, to be honest.
